name: Low Poly Zombie Madness | VR Game
name_original: Low Poly Zombie Madness | VR Game
description:
Low Poly Zombie Madness is a demo of a horde game concept where we have to kill zombies in an explorable town.

I want to see if you like the idea and the most basic gameplay, to improve and polish it, adding more mechanics, enemies, bosses, multiplayer, etc. .

For now if someone likes to support the development I would appreciate a rating, your feedback and if you really would like to see it complete a donation.
